tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My child was in trouble midnight..it was emergency...on recommendation..we called him..his call rang and after sometime he returned back the call....he was in London...still he returned call....though we were not his patient and addressed our child's problem. You can really
really bank on him 24/7 for padeatric problems.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My child who is just 7 months old, was a severe case of Pneumonia. Dr. Doshi saved his life and have been a god sent angel for us.

Though he is a little rough in speaking, *** ** *** ** *** ****** ************ *** *** **** **** *******

Thanks Doc,
Best Wishes from us.

tags: None
review: Very bad and hard attitude.. Dr Rajen Doshi Fortis Mulund keep parents in blind.. my 2 months old child were suffering from cough and he is giving distress medicine. ** ** ****** ** **** ** ***** ***** ********** ** ***** ** ******** ****** ***** * **** ******

Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Rajen Doshi is very helpful and best Dr. ever for children .I don't know why Today Dr. talking very roughly with my Wife and me. we are went for treatment of my 3 years Doughter and he suffers from heavy fever he given best treatment but but I m very disappointed of Dr. behaviour.

tags: None
review: ********* **** ** * **** ******my kid is 14mnt old was admitted to cuudle hospital bt v wer nt satisfied n v took dama discharge.n later v got medicine bt on 2nd opinion v came to knw dat medicine r nt related to his reports and rajan sir chngd d medicine and he is completely fine aft 1 dose..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Being Gujarati he spoked in Marathi which just made us comfortable.
Then he checked baby properly slowly cooly calmly 
Explained in details Do's and Dont's in new born. 
Also said you can call me anytime.
No need for coming for every small issues which you can manage at home yourself.
He prescribed medicines for various infections to be.He is wonderful human being and Doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very good nd satisfactory diagnosis he saved my child who is underweight nd given perfect treatment for her thanks doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: ** ** *** **** ******* ******* ** **** ** *** * *** **** *** his understanding and dedication towards his patients is unmatchable..kudos

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr. Rajan arrived for my help like a God and he advised the accurate treatment for my child when she was in a very critical and vulnerable condition. Iam so very thankful to Dr. Rajan in all the ways. Best wishes!
